successes.title: The Zen Habits Book
successes.description: A book about mastering the art of change — how to change habits & deal with life changes, frustrations with others, and more. **Update: Book is no longer for sale, but wider release planned for end of 2015.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU EDITION: Your name on the official project thank you page! And a silent thank you from Leo, with a smile.
WEB EDITION: You'll receive a link to access the  digital web-version of the book. Plus, your name on the thank you page.
DIGITAL EDITIONS: Kindle, iPad, PDF and web editions. Plus a bonus manifesto: Creating a Movement of Change. Your name on the thank you page.

DIGITAL EDITIONS + SPECIAL WEBINAR: Kindle, iPad, PDF and web editions. Plus a *bonus webinar* with Leo hosted by the CEO of the Lift habit app, limited to 200 people. Plus bonus manifesto: Creating a Movement of Change. Your name on the thank you page.

PRINT EDITON: ONE COPY of the limited edition Zen Habits print book shipped to you anywhere in the world. You'll also receive all 4 digital editions, and Kickstarter-exclusive *bonus guides* on procrastination & effectiveness, and mindfulness. Plus bonus manifesto: Creating a Movement of Change, and your name on the thank you page.
Ships anywhere in the world, and shipping costs are already included.

HELP SHAPE THE BOOK - EARLY BIRD EDITON: Three (3) print copies of the limited-edition Zen Habits book (two to share with  friends), plus early access to the web edition of the book in December where you can give feedback that will change the book. You'll also receive all 4 digital editions, and Kickstarter-exclusive bonus guides mentioned above. Plus bonus manifesto: Creating a Movement of Change, and your name on the thank you page.

LOVE EDITION: SIX COPIES (6) of the limited-edition print book — 1 for yourself and 5 to give as gifts for friends. Great for offices. (Best deal) Plus the above: all 4 digital editions, Kickstarter-exclusive bonus guides, bonus manifesto: Creating a Movement of Change, & thank you page.

SMALL WEBINAR EDITION: Invitation to a live video webinar with Leo, limited to 10 people per webinar, where you can ask Leo questions live. Plus six (6) print books, all 4 digital editions, Kickstarter-exclusive bonus guides, bonus manifesto: Creating a Movement of Change, thank you page.

THREE MONTH COACHING PROGRAM & PRIVATE EVENT EDITION: Along with 8 copies of the limited-edition book, you'll be enrolled in a small-group coaching program for 3 months (starting in January). At the end of the program, you'll be invited to a weekend-long private seminar event in San Francisco with Leo at Samovar Tea & SF Zen Center (in April 2015). Includes food and tea. (Airfare & accommodations not included.) Plus, all 4 digital editions, Kickstarter-exclusive bonus guides, bonus manifesto: Creating a Movement of Change, thank you page.

THREE MONTH COACHING PROGRAM & PRIVATE EVENT EDITION: Along with 8 copies of the limited-edition book, you'll be enrolled in a small-group coaching program for 3 months (starting in January). At the end of the program, you'll be invited to a weekend-long private seminar event in San Francisco with Leo at Samovar Tea & SF Zen Center (in April 2015). Includes food and tea. (Airfare & accommodations not included.) Plus, all 4 digital editions, Kickstarter-exclusive bonus guides, bonus manifesto: Creating a Movement of Change, thank you page.
